name: Unstoppable (HordeOfToast)
description:
Unstoppable will test your skills in the top-down shooter genre. Only the bravest of the brave or the most foolish of the fools dare take on the challenge. Do you dare try to step up to the plate and ask yourself... Are you Unstoppable?

Made for the Florida Polytechnic University Game Jam Fall 2021. Theme was "No one is going to stop you."
